title: (4341) Architect Designed Brand New 2 Storied House Available for Sale, Pelawatha
details: Architect Designed Brand New 2 Storied House Available for Sale in Highly Residential Area 4 Bedrooms, 12.8 Perches) all With Shower Cubicles, Toto fittings and Granite tops. 3 Phase electricity, Pipeline Water With overhead Tank, Hot Water, 02 Pantries, Pantry Cupboards With Granite tops Remote Control Gate Parking for 2 Vehicles, Servant Room and Bathrooms front and back Landscape Garden. Rs : 450/= Negotiable 45 Million
